name: Spellthief (Pascal)
description:
Trapped during a job gone wrong the Spellthief and their operator must battle through waves of Magicorp soldiers to reach freedom. 

The twist? Your energy only regenerates every 10 seconds. Budget your resources and hone your skills to survive this fast-paced action platformer.

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 Jam
